posts.post_title: a few low grade raw t206 for sale (dropped prices)
posts.post_content:
I have a few lower grade cards for sale.  All presentable, but have their issues.

All prices are shipped.  Subtract $2 for each additional card purchased after the first.

Lattimore $16
Niles $16
McQuillan $18
Coveleski $19
Marquard $29

Paypal gift only please (or another paypal option, but you pay any fees).

Thanks for looking.  PM me.
Looks like I priced these a little high.  Dropped prices.
I will take all but marquard at $50 shipped

Thanks for the Chase, Luke.

Doug
